name: Escape From The Dark Essence
description:
This is a small game that I created in about a week, the goal is to collect the photos on the ground before being captured by the monster.
The closer you are to the monster, the louder the music gets.
How To Play
WASD to move
F to turn on/off the flashlight
Left-Shift to run
You have to take 11 photos from the ground to win
